alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 3:24AM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Northern Valley County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be unseasonably cold, with readings in the single digits Wednesday morning. Severe stress expected to young livestock due to cold and wet conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
